business.headline: UPI fraud on the rise: 5 scams you must watch out forFraudsters often at times impersonate banks or organisations and trick victims to reveal sensitive information like UPI account, OTP and PIN details.

New income tax regime: Check revised tax rates, slabs, and will you benefit? Will the new tax regime put more money in your pocket, or should you stick with the old regime? Here is all you need to know.

Rupee hits all-time low of 87.94 against US dollarThe rupee slumped to a new all-time low of 87.95 per US dollar on Monday as fears over potential US trade tariffs rattled regional currencies. This surpasses last week's record of 87.5825. The currency was last trading at 87.9325, marking a 0.6% decline for the day.

Gautam Adani donates Rs 10,000 crore for social causes at younger son's weddingSources close to billionaire Gautam Adani said the Rs 10,000 crore donation will go into the creation of a network of affordable world-class hospitals and medical colleges and advanced global skill academics with assured employability.

Sensex tanks over 600 points: 3 reasons why stock market is falling todayThe BSE Sensex lost over 600 points, while the NSE Nifty dropped close to 200 points in early trade. The Sensex fell to the day's low of 77,189.04 after closing at 77,860.19 in the previous session.

Sensex, Nifty tumble as rupee hits record low; metal, energy stocks dragThe S&P BSE Sensex was down by 394.07 points to 77,466.12, while the NSE Niftt50 fell by 130.10 points to 23,429.85 as of 9:40 AM.

Rupee crashes 44 paise to all-time low of 87.94 against US dollarIn early trade, the rupee weakened to 87.95 per U.S. dollar, surpassing its previous record low of 87.5825 from last week. It was last trading at 87.9325, down 0.6% for the day.

Ajax Engineering IPO open for bidding: Should you subscribe? Check GMPAjax Engineering IPO opens for subscription: The bidding process will close on February 12, 2025. Before the IPO opened for public subscription, Ajax Engineering raised Rs 379.32 crore from anchor investors.

Meta plans to lay off 'lowest performance' staff next week, internal memo revealsNotices will go out to employees losing their jobs starting at 5 am local time on Monday in most countries, including in the US, according to one of the posts, authored by Meta's Head of People Janelle Gale.

Cabinet clears new income tax bill, likely to be tabled in Lok Sabha Monday: SourcesThe new legislation, which is often referred to as the Direct Tax Code, is aimed at overhauling the existing tax structure, making it more streamlined and transparent.

Activate UAN to avail EPFO's ELI scheme benefits before February 15. Check detailsEPFO ELI: UAN or Universal Account Number is a unique 12-digit number allotted by EPFO which is necessary for managing provident fund accounts.

entertainment.headline: Kendrick Lamar performs with Drake's ex Serena Williams at Super Bowl, fans reactIn a surprise act, singer and rapper Drake's former girlfriend Serena Williams joined Kendrick Lamar during his Super Bowl LIX half-time performance, sending the internet into a frenzy. An FIR has been filed against Ranveer, Samay and those who were present as the judges for the episode.

Watch: Ed Sheeran, Shilpa Rao wow Bengaluru fans with Telugu hit ChuttamalleSinger Ed Sheeran surprised fans during his Bengaluru concert after he sang the Telugu hit track, Chuttamalle, with Shilpa Rao. He shared the video on social media and expressed his happiness at learning a new language.

Ed Sheeran clarifies he had permission 'to busk' in Bengaluru: It wasn't randomBritish singer Ed Sheeran has shared a short statement about his street performance in Bengaluru ahead of his concert tonight in the city. The artiste shared that he had permission to perform, contrary to the reports.

Punjabi actor-singer Harrdy Sandhu briefly detained over gig permit in ChandigarhSinger Harrdy Sandhu was detained in Chandigarh on Saturday for performing live without permission. He was later released after organisers provided documents. However, the incident left the Punjabi singer upset as he didn't perform after being released.

Ed Sheeran's street performance in Bengaluru halted by police. WatchBritish singer Ed Sheeran's Bengaluru performance on Church Street was halted by the police as it was being held without prior permission.

Papon's Kaun Mera song completes 12 years: Humbled by the love it still receivesPapon's soulful track Kaun Mera from Special 26 celebrates 12 years. The song's lasting popularity highlights its emotional depth and enduring appeal in Bollywood music.

sports.headline: Rohit Sharma's 33rd century is loading as well: Suresh Raina after Cuttack blitzSuresh Raina feels that the 33rd ODI hundred is loading for Rohit Sharma as the Indian captain came back to form during the match in Cuttack on Sunday, February 9.
